title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) with voided satin ground
description: Ciselé velvet in tan with a ground of uncut pile with small scale conventionalized rose in cut pile. Diagonal decorative lines voided in satin ground.
